Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good news, <MYNAME>! A new resident has
moved into town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've brought him here to introduce him
to you. You can come inside now!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Are you <MYNAME>?
I'm <BLUE>Allen</BLUE>, a top stylist.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>This old timer insisted that I come and
see you, so here I am. Nice to meet you.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We don't have anyone in town who can cut
hair, so I've been searching far and
wide for someone.
<PAGE>
That's when I met Allen here. When I
said we could give him a salon, he
agreed to come and live in town.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've just checked the salon out and it
looks great. Perfect for me to use the
full range of my skills.
<PAGE>
If you want to change your own style a
little, <MYNAME>, come by and see me. I'll
bring you right up to date!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all we wanted to say, anyway.
Sorry for coming by so early in the
morning. Keep up the good work!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
It looks like you're having a bit of a
bad hair day too. Come by and I'll help
sort you out!

A new person has come to the town! Let's
hope we become good friends!
<PAGE>
Better get my hair fixed too...
